parameters.name: AppName
parameters.description: The name of the application to which the live stream belongs. You can view the application name on the [Stream Management](~~197397~~) page of the ApsaraVideo Live console.

parameters.name: BlockType
parameters.description: The blocking type. Valid values: blacklist and whitelist.

parameters.name: LocationList
parameters.description: The blocked region. If you specify multiple regions, such as CN and AS, separate them with commas (,).

parameters.name: ReleaseTime
parameters.description: The time when the blocking ends. The time must be in UTC. If you do not specify this parameter, the blocking is valid for 7 days by default.

parameters.name: StreamName
parameters.description: The name of the live stream. You can view the stream name on the [Stream Management](~~197397~~) page of the ApsaraVideo Live console.
